column2: ENGLISH
Grand Tournament
Furusiyya
War Games
Attending Tournament
Famous Beauty
In her realm, this character is renowned as a great beauty with few equals.
Jealousy
Spent a Pleasant Night Together
Enjoyed Tournament
Wants Revenge
Furusiyya Champion
This character succeeded as a champion in a Furusiyya held in their realm, and thus is considered a warrior of great reputation.
Tournament Champion
This character succeeded as a champion in a Tournament held in their realm, and thus is considered a warrior of great reputation.
War Games Champion
This character succeeded as a champion in the war games held in their realm, and thus is considered a warrior of great reputation.
You will attend [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s tournament, but will not compete\n
Engage [This.GetHerHim] in further conversation...
Begin a romance with [This.GetHerHim], if [This.GetSheHe]'s willing...
Can afford the tournament\n
slain by $KILLER$ while fighting in a furusiyya
slain while fighting in a furusiyya
slain by $KILLER$ while fighting in a tournament
slain while fighting in a tournament
slain by $KILLER$ while fighting in war games
slain while fighting in war games
You've had enough - best to end it now.
End the dalliance before it begins...
You will compete in [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s tournament\n
Attempt to impress [From.GetHerHim] with your prowess.
This will be for a single night only...
Reject [This.GetHerHis] advances.
[This.GetSheHeCap] is greatly impressed by your efforts...
[This.GetSheHeCap] is not at all impressed by your efforts...
Maybe go somewhere a little more private...
Find a way to kill [This.GetTitledFirstName] without attracting notice...

[tournament_host.GetTitledName] has decided to hold a Grand Tournament! [tournament_host.GetSubjectPronounCap] has sent invitations out to warriors across [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName], calling them to assemble at [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] in two months time. This event promises to be a spectacle of enormous magnitude, and it is said that victors in the grand melee event will earn a hefty reward as well as the respect of the realm. May the best fighter earn their praise in the sight of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!

[tournament_host.GetTitledName] has decided to hold a great Furusiyya martial competition. [tournament_host.GetSubjectPronounCap] has sent invitations out to warriors across the [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName], calling them to assemble at [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] in two months time. This event promises to be a spectacle of enormous magnitude, and brings glory and virtue to House [tournament_host.GetOnlyDynastyName] in the sight of Allah. May He guide the righteous with a mighty victory!

[tournament_host.GetTitledName] has decided to hold a great competition in martial skills. [tournament_host.GetSubjectPronounCap] has called for brave warriors across the [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to assemble at [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] in two months time, where they will display their prowess with horse, bow, and sword for the admiration of a horse of spectators. May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] guide the mightiest to victory and honor!
The tournament begins soon!
It shall be a great contest!
The furusiyya begins soon!
I will fight in the tournament!
I will saddle my horse and bow!
I will compete, for the glory of Allah!
I will go and watch the spectacle
Sadly, I am not well enough to attend...
I am too wrapped up in my own affairs, sadly...
The war keeps me from attending, sadly...
I've no interest in going

Everyone at the grand tournament is disappointed to hear of the outbreak of war in [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Unfortunately, this means an immediate end to the festivities...the realm's warriors will need to prove their mettle on the actual battlefield, instead.

Everyone at the war games is disappointed to hear of the outbreak of war in [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Unfortunately, this means an immediate end to the festivities...the realm's warriors will need to prove their mettle on the actual battlefield, instead.

Everyone at the Furusiyya is disappointed to hear of the outbreak of war in [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Unfortunately, this means an immediate end to the festivities...the realm's warriors will need to prove their mettle on the actual battlefield, instead.

With the onset of war in [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the Grand Tournament will unfortunately need to be cancelled. The realm's warriors will need to prove their mettle on the actual battlefield, instead.

With the onset of war in [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the war games will unfortunately need to be cancelled. The realm's warriors will need to prove their mettle on the actual battlefield, instead.

With the onset of war in [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the Furusiyya will unfortunately need to be cancelled. The realm's warriors will need to prove their mettle on the actual battlefield, instead.
The untimely death of [tournament_host.GetTitledName] means that the Grand Tournament will unfortunately need to be cancelled.
The untimely death of [tournament_host.GetTitledName] means that the war games will unfortunately need to be cancelled.
The untimely death of [tournament_host.GetTitledName] means that the Furusiyya will unfortunately need to be cancelled.
Most unfortunate

With the unexpected death of [tournament_host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], the Grand Tournament has been halted and further events cancelled. They are already turning down the tents and quietly asking visitors in [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] to return home. This is, after all, not a time for celebration.

With the unexpected death of [tournament_host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], the war games have been halted and further events cancelled. The gods would not, after all, smile kindly on more fighting and merriment...at least not until the funeral is well underway.

With the unexpected death of [tournament_host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], the Furusiyya has been halted and further events cancelled. They are already turning down the tents and quietly asking visitors in [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] to return home. Allah would not look kindly upon disrespectful merriment during this time of mourning.
The Grand Tournament Begins!
The War Games Begin!
The Furusiyya Begins!

The time has finally arrived! With fighters and spectators streaming into [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] and the streets filling with merchants and curious peasants, the Grand Tournament finally gets underway. Over the next two months all will show their martial brilliance for the greater honor and glory of [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!

Warriors have come to [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] from afar, gathering for the great war games. The impatient stomping of horses accompanies the excited cries from the spectators. As the participants salute you, you give the signal for the contests to begin.

The time has finally arrived! With fighters and spectators streaming into [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] and the streets filling with merchants and entertainers, the Furusiyya finally gets underway. Over the next two months, those gifted with the skills of a true warrior shall be separated from those who only pretend at such.
I will join the competition with the other warriors!
I look forward to watching from the stands

The Grand Tournament has finally arrived! You ride into [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] along with the many other fighters and spectators, seeing merchants and curious peasants lining the streets in multitudes. [tournament_host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_host.GetHerHim]self arrives in full battle regalia, ready to join the combatants, and as the crowd wildly cheers [tournament_host.GetSheHe] declares that for the next two months all will show their martial brilliance for the greater honor and glory of [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!

The Grand Tournament has finally arrived! You ride into [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] along with the many other fighters and spectators, seeing merchants and curious peasants lining the streets in multitudes. [tournament_host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] can be seen in the stands, applauding the warriors before [tournament_host.GetHerHim], and declares that for the next two months all will show their martial brilliance for the greater honor and glory of [tournament_host.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!

You have arrived at [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] along with the multitudes of warriors and spectators for the wargames. The impatient stomping of horses accompanies the excited cries from the crowd. Then [tournament_host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_host.GetHerHim]self arrives on the field in full battle regalia, ready to do battle, and as those gathered proudly salute [tournament_host.GetHerHim] [tournament_host.GetSheHe] gives the signal for the contests to begin.

You have arrived at [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] along with the multitudes of warriors and spectators for the wargames. The impatient stomping of horses accompanies the excited cries from the crowd. As you salute [tournament_host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], watching from the stands, [tournament_host.GetSheHe] gives the signal for the contests to finally begin.

The Furusiyya has finally arrived! You ride into [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] along with the many other fighters and spectators, seeing merchants and entertainers lining the streets in multitudes. [tournament_host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_host.GetHerHim]self arrives in full battle regalia, ready to join the combatants, and as the crowd wildly cheers [tournament_host.GetSheHe] declares that for the next two months those gifted with the skills of a true warrior shall be separated from those who only pretend at such!

The Furusiyya has finally arrived! You ride into [tournament_host.Capital.GetName] along with the many other fighters and spectators, seeing merchants and entertainers lining the streets in multitudes. [tournament_host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] can be seen in the stands, applauding those before [tournament_host.GetHerHim], and declares that for the next two months those gifted with the skills of a true warrior shall be separated from those who only pretend at such!
I will prepare for battle!
How exciting!

As [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] skillfully plunged [tournament_opponent.GetHerHis] blade into my belly and I fell on my back, I reflected briefly on the unfairness of the universe. Then I focused on my fading heartbeat as the blue sky above turned darker and darker...
An honorable way to die

[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] squared off against [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] in the grand melee, and when [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] was struck a heavy blow to the head the dull crack could be heard from across the field. The audience hushed in shock, and it was soon clear that [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] was not going to get up again...

The war games are going well, and on-lookers cheer with excitement when [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] ride at each other on the field. The ring of steel on steel is soon replaced with shocked gasps from the crowd as [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] slips and is all but impaled on [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s blade. It is clearly a mortal wound.

At first, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] appeared equally matched. Then, as the Furusiyya crowd watched, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s horse started and [From.GetSheHe] awkwardly flew out of [From.GetHerHis] saddle when [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s saber struck. It was quickly clear [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] was not going to get up again...
A blow well struck!
I don't need to be told of every death...
[From.GetSheHeCap] should have been quicker

The melee was going well when the [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName]'s mace came crashing down upon me, I managed to block it but my shield shatter under the force of [tournament_opponent.GetHerHis] blow. The next swing came crashing down and the darkness overtook me. I am out of the tournament.

My horse bucked wildly to the side as [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] rushed past on [tournament_opponent.GetHerHis] steed, and I was thrown to the ground. When my senses finally returned, I felt nothing but searing pain and I heard the shouting of on-lookers rushing to my aid. My injuries, however, cannot match my shame.

My horse bucked wildly to the side as [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] rushed past on [tournament_opponent.GetHerHis] camel, and I was thrown to the ground. When my senses finally returned, I felt nothing but searing pain and I heard the shouting of the crowd. It appears I have been badly defeated.

The crowd roars with approval as [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] squares off against [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] in the grand melee. Blow after blow is struck, steel ringing on steel, until finally [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] lands a solid hit and [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] reels and falls. [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] exults in [tournament_opponent.GetHerHis] victory, but it's clear [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is severely injured.

A group of warriors clash during the war games, individuals pairing off against each other, but it's clear [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] are the standouts. They battle to a standstill until finally [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] gets a blow in which [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] will clearly never recover from.

The clash of arms between [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] seems almost personally. Both are skilled, and their display sets the watching crowd on fire. Finally it is [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] who gets the opening, and [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] goes down screaming in a fountain of blood. The watching crowd roars its approval.
That is a *lot* of blood...
I don't need to hear about every injury
At least [tournament_opponent.GetSheHe] got up again...

I sought out a worthy foe in the grand melee, and when [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] came upon me I parried [tounament_opponent.GetHerHis] first thrust. The follow up was too quick for me, however, and a jolt of pain shot through my body.

I sought out a worthy foe in the war games, and when [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] came upon me on [tounament_opponent.GetHerHis] horse I parried the first thrust of  [tounament_opponent.GetHerHis] bade. The follow up was far too quick for me, however, and a jolt of pain shot through my body.

I was facing an opponent in a game of chess, and while pondering my opening moves, the game next to ours turned violent. [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] hurled the board aside to pull out [tournament_opponent.GetHerHis] scimitar, sending chess pieces flying everywhere. One of White's Bishops struck me in the eye.

One of the grand melee's highlights was watching [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] trade blows for almost ten minutes. They were both nearly exhausted when finally [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] shattered [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s shield with a powerful blow and sent the [From.GetManWoman] flying back. [From.GetSheHeCap] is injured and has been knocked out of the tournament.

One of the war games' highlights was watching [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] trade blows with spears for almost ten minutes after having been knocked from their horses. They were both nearly exhausted when finally [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] threw [tournament_opponent.GetHerHis] spear in a desperate gamble and it hit home, sending the [From.GetManWoman] flying back. [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is injured and has been knocked out of the tournament.

One of the Furusiyya's highlights was watching [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [tournament_opponent.GetOnlyDynastyName] trade artful scimitar blows for almost ten minutes. They were both nearly exhausted when finally [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] shattered [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s blade and sent the [From.GetManWoman] flying back. [From.GetSheHeCap] is injured and has been eliminated from the competition.
Well done, [tournament_opponent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]!
It was a gamble that paid off!

We advanced forth into the grand melee, but then I saw our foes and suddenly my bowels loosened and guts turned to water. My comrades all looked on me in disgust, and to this day I truly cannot account for this terror...but it has not left me.

To my shame, I spent most of the war games hidden away and avoiding coming into contact with the other fighters. Some of the on-lookers noticed my reticence and began taunting me, and yet even then all I could do was sit on my horse and let my face redden.

To my great shame, the challenge of keeping my bowels in check during the martial competition proved too much for me. I fled home to escape the taunts of my former comrades and for a change of underwear.
The melee was fought and I went boldly forth, while other stood back I charged forth headless of my own safety.

Suddenly, in the middle of a frenzied charge, a lone spearman thundered towards you on his horse. You waited until exactly the right moment, batted away his spear, and then leapt across to his horse and pushed him off in one smooth motion. It was a feat of bravery that has been the talk of the realm ever since.

Suddenly, in the middle of a frenzied melee, the crowds part to reveal a giant swordsman grinning at you. After he shows off some fancy moves with his sword, the crowds turn expectantly to you. You fling a dagger into the thug's throat and he drops dead to the wild cheers of those nearby.

People felt my leadership skills were poor, some even called me misguided.  Then the tide of the melee turned...but in the heat of battle it was my voice which rose above the others and my direction which turned the tide once again.
There were many who doubted my fighting ability, but when we rode our horses into mock battle only to be ambushed by our opponents, I was the one who led us to victory against all odds.
I have been long renowned for my roughness, but in the recent grand melee the enemy took us by surprise and yet I still lead from the front and steered us to victory.
As we rode our horses into battle in yet another test of skill, I devised a clever ambush against our opponents. We prevailed despite being outnumbered.
The grand melee was challenging and my skills were renowned. Our valiant foes had prepared well, but if it weren't for a moment of brilliance by myself they would have triumphed.
The war games were challenging and my skills were put to the ultimate test. Our valiant foes had prepared well, but if it weren't for a moment of brilliance by myself they would have triumphed.

Many believe that chess is the ultimate test of strategy, and if this is true, your brilliance as a general is undeniable. All who have mustered the courage to challenge you in this game have met with defeat.

I am known for my brilliance but the enemy had developed a counter, claiming that I relied on only a few simple strategies and was too inflexible to think on my feet. Perhaps they were right. Word has spread and my brilliance is diminished.
You are renowned for your skills in strategy and planning, but several defeats in mock battles due to embarrassing mistakes on your part have put this reputation into question.
My skills on the battlefield are well known, but it seems there is a counter to my strategies...and far too many here at the grand melee have heard about it.
My skills on the battlefield are well known, but it seems there is a counter to my strategies...and far too many here at the war games have heard about it.

No matter how hard you try, you cannot wrap your head around this stupid game called chess...a game of which you'd thought yourself to be a master. Your opponents at the Furusiyya always seem to be several moves ahead of you.
In a recent melee the toughness I habitually show has been proven to be misguided.
After repeatedly falling off my horse during a competitive event, many have questioned my abilities as a warrior.

I was taking part in the tournament and enjoying the camaraderie when I found myself entranced with an utterly captivating sparring partner. I told myself it was nothing, but now I find myself glancing at other men and contemplating strange thoughts...

I was taking part in the war games and enjoying the camaraderie when I found myself entranced with an utterly captivating horseman. I told myself it was nothing, but now I find myself glancing at other men and contemplating strange thoughts...
Though I did not participate myself, I felt particularly drawn to the wrestling challenges of the Furusiyya...

Tournaments are such fun, and full of entertainments of every kind and description. Then I noticed a strange sore on my body in a place I would much rather not mention, and it all didn't seem quite as fun any longer...

The war games are such fun, and full of entertainments of every kind and description. Then I noticed a strange sore on my body in a place I would much rather not mention, and it all didn't seem quite as fun any longer...

The Furusiyya is such fun, and full of entertainments of every kind and description. Then I noticed a strange sore on my body in a place I would much rather not mention, and it all didn't seem quite as fun any longer...

To be honest, I'm not quite certain how my time at the grand tournament went. At some point drinks were pressed into my hands, and there was much merriment and laughing and it all became blurred. When it was over a few mornings later I felt terrible and the hair of the dog seemed like the answer.

To be honest, I'm not quite certain how my time at the war games went. At some point mugs were pressed into my hands, and there was much merriment and laughing and it all became blurred. When it was over a few mornings later I felt terrible and the hair of the dog seemed like the answer.

To be honest, I'm not quite certain how my time at the grand tournament went. At some point wine was pressed into my hands, and there was much merriment and laughing and it all became blurred. When it was over a few mornings later, I desired more even though it is haram, forbidden. Surely a few more drops cant hurt?

While I was at the tournament some lower class type with pretensions insulted my honor. I could only do what a [Root.GetManWoman] of my class could do and challenged him to a duel. Naturally he was no match for me.

A fighter had the nerve to insult me in front of several of the other attending warriors. The look on his face when I challenged him to a duel revealed him for the coward he was, but honor left him no choice but to accept. I showed no mercy when I cut him down in single combat.
The grand tournament has been a delight, and I've spent much of my time flitting around the stands and talking to people from all walks of life. It seems as if I'm really good at this, I must say.
The war games have been a delight, and I've spent much of my time mingling with the many on-lookers and learning their stories. It seems as if I'm really good at talking, I must say.
The Furusiyya has been a delight, and I've spent much of my time flitting around the stands and talking to people from all walks of life. It seems as if I'm really good at this, I must say.
I think I'll do more of it

I did not spend half as much time watching the grand melee as I did betting on the battles, and it seems I've quite a keen mind for determining which strategies the warriors were going to use before they did themselves.

I did not spend half as much time watching the war games as I did betting on the battles, and it seems I've quite a keen mind for determining which strategies the warriors were going to use before they did themselves.

I did not spend half as much time watching the Furusiyya as I did in the back tents, playing games of chess in emulation of the contestants themselves. Many commented that my skills put them to shame.
It was not that difficult

I was at the tournament and found myself sitting and listening as two knights plotted together to advantage themselves in the next bought. I listened carefully to their plan and I instantly saw the flaws.

I was at the war games and found myself sitting and listening as two riders plotted together to advantage themselves in the next round of battle. I listened carefully to their plan and I instantly saw the flaws.

I came across two bedouins at the Furusiyya, fierce warriors both, who were plotting to get back at a young noble who had dismissed them as desert rabble. I watched as they carefully cut the girth of the noble's saddle just enough to ensure it would snap during the upcoming riding challenge.

I found myself at the grand tournament, sitting around and listening to two knights plot together to advantage themselves in the next bought. I offered them some advice which...went rather poorly. How was I supposed to know?

I found myself at the war games, sitting around and listening to two horsemen plot together to advantage themselves in the next round of battle. I offered them some advice which...went rather poorly. How was I supposed to know?

I came across two bedouins, fierce warriors both, who were plotting to get back at a young noble who had dismissed them as desert rabble. I told them to face the man directly instead of scheming behind his back like bitter old women! That...did not go well.

While at the tournament I was listening to some lesser lordling describe how he collected tithes from his serfs. As I listened, I realized he was also providing his serfs plenty of ways to avoid giving their due.

Learned men from all around the land have come to the war games to observe the spectacle and share insights and wisdom with each other. I spent some time listening to their discussions and learned much about how best to rule the land.

Learned men from all around the land have come to the Furusiyya to observe the spectacle and share insights and wisdom with each other. I spent some time listening to their discussions and learned much about how best to rule the land.

While at the tournament I joined in a conversation with other lords on how best to collect tithes. I saw a far easier way and it caused quite an argument with many lords disagreeing with my stance, but the more I talked the more I convinced myself that I was right.

Learned men from all around the land have come to the war games to observe the spectacle and share insights and wisdom with each other. I joined one of their debates and offered my own opinions on how to govern, only to have them laugh in my face!

Learned men from all around the land have come to the Furusiyya to observe the spectacle and share insights and wisdom with each other. I joined one of their debates and offered my own opinions on how to govern, only to have them laugh in my face!

I was simply passing time at the tournament when I saw two knights argue over honor. I knew straight away that the argument was spurious and the result would be unnecessary bloodshed. So I stepped in and prevented it.

Two men assigned to my group of horsemen for the upcoming mock battle were constantly at each other's throats. It was clear they would sooner fight each other than our opponents, so for the sake of our group I decided to mediate in their conflict.

Two men assigned to my cavalry wing for the upcoming mock battle were constantly at each other's throats. It was clear they would sooner fight each other than our opponents, so for the sake of our team I decided to mediate in their conflict.

I was simply passing time at the tournament when I saw two knights argue over honor. I knew straight away that the argument was spurious and the result would be unnecessary bloodshed. I attempted to mediate the dispute and they later told me at least one of the knights should survive the resulting duel.

Two men assigned to my group of horsemen for the upcoming mock battle were constantly at each other's throats. It was clear they would sooner fight each other than our opponents, so I called them out like the bickering women they were and demanded they settle their differences in a duel.

Two men assigned to my cavalry wing for the upcoming mock battle were constantly at each other's throats. It was clear they would sooner fight each other than our opponents, so I called them out like the bickering women they were and demanded they settle their differences in a duel.
Throughout the grand tournament, I find myself the center of attention. All the men are looking at me, and all the other ladies are jealous. As it really should be, I suppose.
Throughout the war games, I find myself the center of attention. All the men are looking at me, and all the other ladies are jealous. As it really should be, I suppose.
Throughout the Furusiyya, I find myself the center of attention. All the men are looking at me, and all the other ladies are jealous. As it really should be, I suppose.
It was a marvelous time

I'm receiving so much attention at the grand tournament. Everywhere I turn, someone is paying me a compliment or trying to sell something to me. It's all so overwhelming, and I have to remember that none of this is deserved. We all have our virtues and vices, after all.

I'm receiving so much attention at the war games. Everywhere I turn, someone is paying me a compliment or trying to sell something to me. It's all so overwhelming, and I have to remember that none of this is deserved. We all have our virtues and vices, after all.

I'm receiving so much attention at the Furusiyya. Everywhere I turn, someone is paying me a compliment or trying to sell something to me. It's all so overwhelming, and I have to remember that none of this is deserved. We all have our virtues and vices, after all.
I must remain humble in the face of it all
This tournament is wonderful, there are so many people to talk to! I've met so many new friends already...
These war games are so wonderful, there are so many people to talk to! I've met so many new friends already...
This Furusiyya is wonderful, there are so many people to talk to! I've met so many new friends already...
We will be friends forever, I'm certain

There are so many strange people here at the tournament, I don't feel at ease around them at all. Just now, a woman I have never seen before tried to strike up a conversation, and I found myself speechless. I wish I could return rather than wait for it all to end.

There are so many strange people here at the war games, I don't feel at ease around them at all. Just now, a woman I have never seen before tried to strike up a conversation, and I found myself speechless. I wish I could return rather than wait for it all to end.

There are so many strange people here at the Furusiyya, I don't feel at ease around them at all. Just now, a woman I have never seen before tried to strike up a conversation, and I found myself speechless. I wish I could return rather than wait for it all to end.

I've found myself in trouble more than once as I gave other ladies at the tournament my honest opinion of their fashions. What was I suppose to do? Lie to them? They looked like over-stuffed melons.
I've found myself in trouble more than once as I gave other ladies watching the war games my honest opinion of their fashions. What was I suppose to do? Lie to them? They looked like beggars!
I've found myself in trouble more than once as I gave other ladies at the Furusiyya my honest opinion of their fashions. What was I suppose to do? Lie to them? They looked like harlots!
Honesty truly is the best policy

My opinion has been asked for so often here at the tournament, but nobody wants me to truly speak my mind. So I spin them tales they prefer to hear, and they delight in them. Really, I've become quite good at it.

My opinion has been asked for so often here at the war games, but nobody wants me to truly speak my mind. So I spin them tales they prefer to hear, and they delight in them. Really, I've become quite good at it.

My opinion has been asked for so often here at the Furusiyya, but nobody wants me to truly speak my mind. So I spin them tales they prefer to hear, and they delight in them. Really, I've become quite good at it.

Some of the knights here at the tournament are so very handsome. It is a parade of marvelous flesh. If one of them were to proposition me, I swear I would swoon!
Some of the horsemen here at the war games are so very handsome. It is a parade of marvelous flesh. If one of them were to proposition me, I swear I would swoon!
Some of the warriors here at the Furusiyya are so very handsome. It is a parade of marvelous flesh. If one of them were to proposition me, I swear I would swoon!
I'm not being too eager, am I?
So many of the ladies here at the tournament allow their heads to be turned by a pretty face and a dashing manner, but not I.
So many of the ladies here watching the war games allow their heads to be turned by a pretty face and a dashing manner, but not I.
So many of the ladies here at the Furusiyya allow their heads to be turned by a pretty face and a dashing manner, but not I.

I may have been admitted into the grand tournament, but I keep hearing jeering whispers behind me. It seems some of the men here believe me unworthy of competing in their martial games, even though none have the guts to say the words to my face.

I may be here at the war games with my horse and a readiness to do battle, but I keep hearing jeering whispers behind me. It seems some of the men believe me unworthy of competing, even though none have the guts to say the words to my face.

I may have been admitted into the Furusiyya, but I keep hearing jeering whispers behind me. It seems some of the men here believe me unworthy of competing in their martial games, even though none have the guts to say the words to my face.

There are so many people here at the grand tournament, crowds pressing in together and so many hands reaching for you. It's no wonder I find myself feeling as if I've come down with some kind of illness.
There are so many people here at the war games, crowds pressing in together and so many hands reaching for you. It's no wonder I find myself feeling as if I've come down with some kind of illness.
There are so many people here at the Furusiyya, crowds pressing in together and so many hands reaching for you. It's no wonder I find myself feeling as if I've come down with some kind of illness.

My time at the tournament has been spent receiving notes from ardent admirers, and having men fall all over me to do the slightest thing I ask. Painters tell me they will paint my portrait, and I always have someone to dance with. Really it's all just a little much.

My time at the war games has been spent receiving looks from ardent admirers, and having mighty warriors fall all over me to do the slightest thing I ask. Bards tell me they shall sing songs of my beauty, and I always have someone to dance with. Really it's all just a little much.

My time at the Furusiyya has been spent receiving visits from ardent admirers, and having noble warriors fall all over me to do the slightest thing I ask. Poets tell me they shall compose odes to my beauty, and I always have someone to dance with. Really it's all just a little much.
